news.title: Operation Blindside
news.text: British forces has been given the task to infiltrate @ eliminate a warlord

news.title: Operation Saving Captain Hawkeye
news.text:
One of our own have been taking captive (a Rupert no less), he is being held in a compound Neochori. 
Your job is to get him out alive, once close enough he will join you. Get him to the extraction point. 
You will be inserted along the coastline to the north east and will have to make your own way there, you have vehicles but use them at your own advisement.
Once you have secured the hostage an extraction team will be waiting for you back up the coast.

news.title: Operation Premature Detonation
news.text: Intel Says one of the local tribes has been messing with IED’s and mines of late. We can’t allow this so they must be eliminated. This local tribe is well armed and inhabits a northern outer village. They don’t like NATO on a good day so you sneaking up at night will cause a fight avoid if possible. As a side note they are on good terms with a better armed group to the west.

news.title: Operation Fragile Package
news.text:
Your Company (PMC) has been given the contract to escort VIPs to and from the US Embassy. On a routine run, Hostile forces have ambushed your convoy and are trying to box you in.
Get the VIP to the Embassy alive.

news.title: Operation Blindworm
news.text: June 12th 2009, Kunduz province, Afghanistan. The province is still rife with Taliban insurgents, ANA and ANP backed by NATO forces have a loose hold on the area but at a cost, casualties are high and the enemy is showing no sign of giving up. The fighting has been going on for so long now that no civilians remain in the region.

news.title: Operation SAR
news.text:
A Special Forces operative operating behind enemy lines was being extracted via Ghosthawk when it got shot down.
A S.A.R team is deployed to the last known position of the aircraft.
Satellite imaging is unable to locate the crash site but has shown heavy enemy activity (infantry and vehicle) in the area.

This is open to ALL INF members!!

news.title: Operation Blackjack down 3CB
news.text:
A Merlin (Designation BlackJack A-1) has gone down on a flyover from Fallujah International to FOB Gander. Contact was lost east of the Jolan District. 
Your Mission is to Insert via Helicopter at a point in the south, and move in on foot. Try to locate the chopper and her crew.

news.title: Operation Crash & Grab
news.text:
We received a distress call from Eagle 1-1 that he had been engaged by ground attack over Pulkovo in Chernarus , Your mission will be to find Eagle 1-1 and bring him home. 
The only Intel we have is that Russian forces have been seen operating within the area of Nadezhdino so expect military force and we expect the package will have been moved to that location.

news.title: Operation Vandergrift Security Patrol
news.text:
Mission: 
June 4th 1968, the morning security patrol. 3rd squad’s NCO and the Platoon Commander spent last night planning the route. On this patrol three of the POIs will be searched for enemy activity before combing the river banks for signs of enemy movement, this route will head south arcing round to the east before heading north along the river and back towards the station. Waypoints have been marked and will be used as both navigation points and objective areas.

Click on sign up for full briefing.

news.title: Operation Convoy Drama
news.text: We're the bad guys, as in real bad. There is a US convoy coming through the town, we're going to stop them. Through any means necessary, be it blow them up, shoot them or otherwise, make them pay.

news.title: Operation Snipefish
news.text:
In 2020 the world saw a miraculous change in political tensions following the “Bering Strait” incident. The USS Gerald R Ford and its escort ships were heavily damaged in the first attempt by a main force fleet to navigate the arctic. With the fleet flag ship on the verge of sinking, a general SOS was broadcast. The only ships for 300 miles were part of a Chinese/Russian joint exercise and, in an unexpected turn, immediately vectored north. Using the emergency diplomatic line set up between Washington and Moscow in 2014 the Russian and Chinese vessels were allowed access to the US fleet with some of the most courageous seamanship seen in recent years; all three nations battled for six hours to save lives and ships. The Gerald R Ford was scuttled with only the loss of 23 of her crew yet the combined efforts of all remaining vessels meant that no other ships were lost with four US ships being towed to Ports in Alaska by Russian and Chinese ships. 

At an emergency UN security council meeting all member states were unanimous in their praising of all nations and personal involved in the incident, using it as a stepping stone for future co-operation. The US pulled its opposition to the Syrian Regime with the Russians and Chinese cutting all existing ties with North Korea forcing them to the negotiating table. With the cooling of tensions across the globe most nations were able to turn their attention back to counter terror operations.

news.title: Operation Deadstick
news.text:
Mission:

The objectives of this day as far larger in number than any one team can accomplish. Our
platoon is to function as one cog in a much larger machine. For Operation Overlord to be a
success the beach landing must be allowed time to establish beach heads and have the 
freedom to move inland as soon as possible. This can only be achieved if the bridges and
crossings along the waterways, separating the sectors, are taken and held by airborne infantry.
-----  Signing up will take you to the full brief.

news.title: Operation Fragile Package
news.text:
our Company (PMC) has been given the contract to escort VIPs to and from the US Embassy. On a routine run, Hostile forces have ambushed your convoy and are trying to box you in.
Get the VIP to the Embassy alive.

news.title: Operation Stoneroot
news.text:
MARSOC forces have been tasked with a mission to capture the GLA commander Dr. Thrax. 
The good doctor has been threatening the world with a WMD attack and it is time to take him out of the equation. 

Intel gathered by Navy SEALs and our assets in country indicates that our best chance of removing Thrax will be tonight. Being unopposed for many years the doctor has become over confident and our sources believe he is planning a show of strength from the main coastal city of Kavala. 
As a show of power he has forcibly removed the city’s population and fill the streets with his men creating what he refers to as a "Walking Fortress". Ironically this "Fortress" is the most exposed he has been for months now. As part of his display he will be showing off one of his WMDs 
which is expected to be at his side at all times.

news.title: Operation Black Jack Down
news.text:
A Merlin (Designation BlackJack A-1) has gone down on a flyover from Fallujah International to FOB Gander. Contact was lost east of the Jolan District. 
Your Mission is to Insert via Helicopter at a point in the south, and move in on foot. Try to locate the chopper and her crew.

news.title: Operation Vicarial (Revisited)
news.text:
Takistan has been at war for as long as history has been recorded. Since the NATO coalition invaded in 2008 the region has been in a state of fragile stability with the IDAP humanitarian aid group being able to restore some semblance of civilization to the country.

The Nationalist militia do not attack the IDAP aid missions but after so many years of conflict the amount of mines in the area make free movement difficult at best.
Sign up for full brief

news.title: Operation Blindworm
news.text:
June 12th 2009, Kunduz province, Afghanistan. The province is still rife with Taliban insurgents, ANA and ANP backed by NATO forces have a loose hold on the area but at a cost, casualties are high and the enemy is showing no sign of giving up. The fighting has been going on for so long now that no civilians remain in the region.

The ANP have lost contact with their outpost in Kar Sheck. As of this time nothing is known about the fate of the compound, yet an ANA patrol sent to investigate was pushed back by intense enemy resistance in the surrounding area. The job is made even more difficult as the routes to the camp are heavily mined with IEDs. The ANA have a base on the MSR in the region and are coordinating the investigation from there.

news.title: Laws of War DLC
news.text: ARMA 3, Explore a different perspective on the battlefield

news.title: Operation House of cards
news.text:
The S.A.S has been called in to eliminate a potential nuclear threat.
Your mission is simple, get in, get the codes ,disable the warheads and eliminate the man responsible, then extract.
